hero.title: Welcome to TechInsights
hero.subtitle: Sharing knowledge about AI, Programming, SmartHome, IoT and Electronics for everyone
hero.slogan: "Continuously learning to pioneer technology, connecting traditional values with modern power. Every line of code, circuit, or technology solution aims for creativity, stability and humanity."

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai.description: Practical AI applications from office automation to complex data analysis. Sharing experience in LLM Engineering and modern AI tools.

programming.title: Programming & Development
programming.description: Tutorials on Java, JavaScript, React Native, and mobile app development. Sharing experience in ERP deployment with Odoo.

smartHome.title: SmartHome & IoT
smartHome.description: Guide to building smart homes with Tuya, eWeLink, Broadlink. From basic to advanced, helping you create modern living spaces.

electronics.title: Electrical & Electronics
electronics.description: Basic knowledge of circuits, transistors, ICs and microcontrollers. Guide to designing solar power systems for homes.

systems.title: Systems & Networks
systems.description: Linux/Windows system administration, network security, and data backup. Sharing enterprise IT infrastructure operation experience.

database.title: Databases
database.description: Deep administration of Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL and MongoDB. Performance optimization and efficient database design.

contact.title: Contact & Connect
contact.description: Let's connect to learn and share technology knowledge together!
